issue.title: qt4 moc files are regenerated whenever cmake is invoked

content.raw:
I did some testing on my mac using home-brew to compile the versions of cmake used by several ubuntu distributions. Here's a summary:
~~~
precise  2.8.7     ok
quantal  2.8.9     broken
raring   2.8.10.1  broken
saucy    2.8.11.2  broken
trusty   2.8.12.1  ok
~~~
So this appears to be a cmake problem, not a gazebo problem. You can work around the problem for quantal-saucy by manually installing a version of cmake >= 2.8.12.1 or just wait for trusty.
content.html:
I did some testing on my mac using home-brew to compile the versions of cmake used by several ubuntu distributions. Here's a summary:

precise  2.8.7     ok
quantal  2.8.9     broken
raring   2.8.10.1  broken
saucy    2.8.11.2  broken
trusty   2.8.12.1  ok

So this appears to be a cmake problem, not a gazebo problem. You can work around the problem for quantal-saucy by manually installing a version of cmake >= 2.8.12.1 or just wait for trusty.
